about_the_game:
From the dark depths of the Abyss, the KILL KNIGHT Original Soundtrack has been unearthed and is primed to bless your ears with the haunting sounds of the Eldritch Otherworld. Composed by Finn Idris, Thomas Scott and Filmmaker, the KILL KNIGHT OST includes over an hour of music across 14 nerve-rattling tracks that will allow you to truly dance with Death.

The KILL KNIGHT Original Soundtrack is available as a standalone purchase or as part of a bundle with the full-game.

content_descriptors.notes: The KILL KNIGHT Original Soundtrack contains occasional references to violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

short_description: From the dark depths of the Abyss, the KILL KNIGHT Original Soundtrack has been unearthed and is primed to bless your ears with the haunting sounds of the Eldritch Otherworld. Stimulate your senses with over an hour of music across 14 nerve-rattling tracks.
